text: "The Other Woman" is a 1982 debut solo single by Ray Parker Jr. and is the title track to his debut studio album The Other Woman. It went to number 4 in the United States and New Zealand, number 7 in Canada, number 1 in Australia and number 6 in South Africa. ==References== Category:1982 songs Category:Debut singles Category:Pop rock songs Category:Ray Parker Jr. songs
title: The Other Woman (Ray Parker Jr. song)
